mapper.insert: INSERT INTO score_record (i_user, actual_mode_score, octave, level) VALUES (#{i_user}, #{actual_mode_score}, #{octave}, #{level});
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(actual_mode_score) AS actual_mode_score FROM score_record WHERE i_user = #{i_user};
SELECT actual_mode_score, i_score_record, i_user, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY actual_mode_score DESC, i_score_record DESC) my_rank FROM score_record
